title: LA-18-10: Publication of the Final Rule Revising 5 C.F.R. part 2634
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/AB4392345BCC2C6F852585D60073B822/$FILE/LA-18-10 Publication of the Final Rule Revising 5 C.F.R. part 2634.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory provides guidance regarding the updates to 5 C.F.R. part 2634, which covers Executive branch financial disclosure, Qualified Trusts, and Certificates of Divestiture. Attached to the Legal Advisory is a table detailing the changes.
